Sentence.string: Good morning Mr. Norrington, detective Percy White. What do you know about what happened to Marcus Blayton ?
What happened to him is terrible, indeed. But I don’t know anything about his death. Now, I have to learn my lines.
Your lines ? But the premiere was yesterday. Aren’t you supposed to know them already ?
I’m speaking about my new role. Jonathan Cole gave me the lead after what happened yesterday.
